input.name: placeholder
input.label: Placeholder
input.help-text: [Optional] Add a helpful text to give instructions on what to type into an input field. This is placed as a grayed out text in the input field, and will disappear when the user writes something in it. Tip: Do not replace a useful label with a placeholder. As soon as the user writes in the field, this text will no longer be visible, and screen readers may have difficulties reading this. A minimum should be to have the same information in the title/tooltip.
